        public void onDisable()

      • addListener

        public static void addListener(Plugin plugin,
               VanillaPlayerListListener listener)
        Adds a listener for player list updates. The listener is automatically removed once the plugin which registered it is disabled.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The plugin registering the listener
        listener - The listener to register

      • removeListener

        public static void removeListener(VanillaPlayerListListener listener)
        Removes a registered listener. If the listener was not registered this method has no effect.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to unregister

      • getPlayersPings

        public static java.util.List<PlayerPing> getPlayersPings()
        Gets a list of all currently online players and their ping. The list is ordered by the time the players logged on to the server.
        Returns:
        The list of online players and their ping
